title: More Harrowing skins incoming.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

I'm on the skins teams, and wanted to pop in to clarify a few things from this post. 

This year's thematic is more geared towards zombies/slayers as opposed to the Shadow Idles thematic (Harrowing) we had last year. (We'll be posting some additional messaging  explaining the change a bit more in depth super soon!)

That said, there are **no other** skins coming for this event. The only skins will be Slayer Jinx, Slayer Pantheon and Zombie Nunu. 

Of course, more things are coming, but they won't be skins. 

Sorry for any confusion here!

Ah, well, that's extremely disappointing. The Harrowing skins have been super iffy since 2013. This is almost as bad as the year that there were only 2 Harrowing skins, and 1 was Cop Vi, which has nothing to do with Halloween.

Zombie Nunu? That's cool, even though we already have some zombie skins... but man, the other ones are real let downs. No spirit of Halloween at all.

Well...Cop vi looks like a stripper.

Sexy Trick or Treating?
So did the Officer Cait that it matches, so they are perfect ;)
Officer Cait at least doesn't defy physics.
Officer Cait had nothing to do with Halloween.
Never said she did. She's just a stripper outfit :)

No Officer Caitlyn is just a costume, a common costume that is worn at Halloween partys by women and even men.
That is atleast what i always see on TV and the Media overall.

> [{quoted}](name=FrankyCentaur,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=hRy4Mj8g,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2015-10-14T20:29:01.914+0000)
>
> Ah, well, that's extremely disappointing. The Harrowing skins have been super iffy since 2013. This is almost as bad as the year that there were only 2 Harrowing skins, and 1 was Cop Vi, which has nothing to do with Halloween.
> 
> Zombie Nunu? That's cool, even though we already have some zombie skins... but man, the other ones are real let downs. No spirit of Halloween at all.

Chinese overlords at Tencent don't allow fun, or spooky. Graves can't have a cigar as a man, Karthus/Sion can't have bones. What is next?
the slayer skins were terrible honestly, nunu was the only redeeming one

I am sorry you got so many down votes just because you cleared the air. :(
people just really wanted those much toted fan-creations known as Necromancer Azir and Spooky Bard.
Not like ideas like those are never going to happen. If anything you guys could still make skins like those in the future if your group (or whoever makes the choices) decides to make them, right?

Honesty is the best policy, but I do understand it's a big change from what we've done in the past, which may cause an upset. 

We could potentially make these skins down the road if it works for the thematic we were going for.
People aren't upset because the skins aren't "Shadow Isles-themed", people are upset because at a big event people are looking forward to, Riot decides to make dogshit skins
I agree, I do prefer the shadow idles because it fit well. Zombie and Hunter theme is cool and all just not Halloween. And yeah, the skins all suck on top of that.
They aren't dog shit.

Wait, what? I can't get Zombie Brand? I been waiting for like almost a whole year to buy that one. Or do you mean that those three will be the only NEW skins for harrowing? When is harrowing anyways? If you just told us the date, then everyone will stop complaining... It's rather similar thematically to halloween, so naturally everyone expects it on halloween...

The event is different than other years, as noted [here](http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/Grefbrd1-a-note-about-the-harrowing). The event will begin a bit later this patch - 5.21. There will be legacy skins returning to the store.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=hRy4Mj8g,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-10-14T20:21:42.462+0000)
>
> Hiya! 
> 
> I'm on the skins teams, and wanted to pop in to clarify a few things from this post. 
> 
> This year's thematic is more geared towards zombies/slayers as opposed to the Shadow Idles thematic (Harrowing) we had last year. (We'll be posting some additional messaging  explaining the change a bit more in depth super soon!)
> 
> That said, there are **no other** skins coming for this event. The only skins will be Slayer Jinx, Slayer Pantheon and Zombie Nunu. 
> 
> Of course, more things are coming, but they won't be skins. 
> 
> Sorry for any confusion here!

More things are coming? For the Harrowing or Halloween or neither?

If its for one of those, I hate to say it but you guys are kinda too late on that. Halloween is over now so if you still have anything Harrowing related to release, its lost some of its pizazz. 

Say what you want that Halloween!=Harrowing, but for like 80% of the playerbase, it does and won't change.

This year's event is different than other years. The event isn't specifically tied to Halloween, which is why the content wasn't released on Saturday. You can get a bit more info [here](http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/Grefbrd1-a-note-about-the-harrowing). 

That said, the zombie/Slayers skins will be coming out later this patch - 5.21, and legacy skins will be returning to the store during this time as well.

Best Halloween skin - Nosferatu Vladimir, hands down.
Just kidding, his effects are pretty bad. But his model appeals me the most even if its old.
_I will get old faster than he gets a VU. _

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=hRy4Mj8g,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-10-14T20:21:42.462+0000)
>
> Hiya! 
> 
> I'm on the skins teams, and wanted to pop in to clarify a few things from this post. 
> 
> This year's thematic is more geared towards zombies/slayers as opposed to the Shadow Idles thematic (Harrowing) we had last year. (We'll be posting some additional messaging  explaining the change a bit more in depth super soon!)
> 
> That said, there are **no other** skins coming for this event. The only skins will be Slayer Jinx, Slayer Pantheon and Zombie Nunu. 
> 
> Of course, more things are coming, but they won't be skins. 
> 
> Sorry for any confusion here!

Zombies are a really overdone theme in video games and it's hard to get excited over them anymore. It's really disappointing you guys didn't try for something more original. It feels like you just went for the low hanging fruit with these skins.
So we won't be getting good Harrowing skins this year period, basically?
Laaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaame
so this means there wont be anymore spooky skins, as in halloween related?
f34$ you

LOL -30 DISLIKES THAT SHOWS HOW MUCH WE WANT NEW SKINS
but i love zombie nunu
SADLY i wont buy it unless i have enough rp xD i already made my list!

Very strange. Riot KateyKaos just [posted](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/EOtjEGZo-rioters-i-have-to-question-your-decision-making-on-these-latest-harrowing-skins?comment=0004000a0000) that there will not be more skins (at least not Halloween themed ones).

Riot Gaussrik's post doesn't actually say there will be more skins, just more things.
Just clarified a bit more above. :] Thanks for pointing it out!
so does it mean the old Zombie Skins like Zombie brand or ryze is comin out because they are Zombies and the theme is slayer and zombies
Legacy skins will be making a return to the store! :]
I hope so i can't bear having only unoriginal zombie hunter skins this year, i mean COME ON who doesn't want to see something like Underworld Azir. Zombies are overrated and overused booo

*Raises hand*
Me. Azir is a waste. The only thing which can make me like his "Woo Underworld skin" that everyone praises is if he will look like a **Plague Doctor**. But just a spooky green bird that everyone wants? Nah.
So... Proof that people that posted hate threads over-reacted to PBE content?  I'm surprised... not really.  Also a link would be cool to see the proof.
http://boards.las.leagueoflegends.com/es/c/charlas-generales/YA1qV4IN-sugerencia-harrowing-slayers-y-zombies?comment=0009
That said, there are no other skins coming for this event. The only skins will be Slayer Jinx, Slayer Pantheon and Zombie Nunu.  Does that mean no Ravenborn Lb this year?
Um.. I WANT KITTY KAT KATARINA I'VE BEEN WAITING FOR SO LONG
still waiting for arcade {{champion:112}}
Please let it be Necromancer Azir and Spooky Bard

My guesses for the actual Harrowing skins are

Zombie Tyrant or Pumpkin King Azir

Blood Caller Nami

Little lich Lulu
Awesome.   Upvote to get people to stop overreacting.

> [{quoted}](name=Sang Noir,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=hRy4Mj8g,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-10-14T19:38:26.207+0000)
>
> Awesome.   Upvote to get people to stop overreacting.

I think people started officially overreacting because while they got an actual response like a normal Riot employee should give (I know, odd to think we should get a straight answer), we instead only got an explanation of WHY we got the skins and a cryptic "more stuff is coming or something" with no context of what it is.

I think that still raised eyebrows as this has been said before, and that "more to come" wasn't more skins, it was like, a rehashed game mode or something.  That is why it kept snowballing into overreacting because riot NA (or anywhere else aside from that one person) tried to be cute about it and not give any real info.

This is why it happens time and time again the past year, because Riot seems to feel we prefer them to be sneaky and cutesy with no info instead of just telling us like it is :P (I know that was all long-winded, sorry).
